description: New chat button creates a fresh conversation
steps: Verify a new conversation is created
Check that chat area shows welcome state

description: User can send a message and receive a response
steps: Type a message in the input field
Press Enter or click Send button
Verify message appears in chat history
Verify response is received and displayed

description: Conversation history persists across page reloads
steps: Send several messages in a conversation
Navigate back to the same conversation
Verify all previous messages are displayed
Verify sidebar expands to original width
